official.headline: Marek Halden Passes
official.anchor_line: Marek Halden, esteemed leader of innovation, has passed away.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd remains solid as ever, showcasing a resilient system continuing Halden's legacy of advanced infrastructure.

underground.headline: Halden's Heart Halts
underground.anchor_line: Founder of BCI, Marek Halden, found dead in a sealed room—citing 'cardiac arrest' but hiding deeper plots.
underground.contextual_reframing: System falters, exposing cracks; no wonder individuals vanish without a trace—BCI chaos or engineered outcome?
